Scenes depicting heroic combatants are etched deeply into each of the four sides of the pillars, signifying great battles of the past and those yet to come. The earth is well trodden, having been packed hard by the numerous accomplished combatants, as well as those amateur to the combative arts. Evidence of foot traffic is everywhere - the grass is trampled, sword lashes scar the earth, and black scorch marks are reminiscent of the power of those who wield fire. Curiously, the ground beyond the coruscating portal remains untouched by the regular skirmishes.</font><font color="#009E9E"> An argent intercessor is poised here, hefting an ancient-looking halberd in her glowing hands. A sigil in the shape of a small, rectangular monolith is on the ground. </font><font color="#FF00FF">You see exits leading east</font><font color="#D3D3D3"> and </font><font color="#FF00FF">out</font><font color="#D3D3D3">.
